nodes.text: Motion sickness, also called "sea-sickness", was a condition that caused nausea and was often aggravated by repetitive motion, such as the rocking of a ship at sea. Many large starships such as Star of Empire were designed to dampen motion to prevent passengers from getting this condition.

The Cularin system criminal Jasper was known to suffer from this condition. The idea of Fian cities on Galantos sitting atop gelatin seas made Tahiri Veila motion sick. Due to their arboreal lifestyle, the insectoid Noehon species were resistant to the affects of motion sickness.
